tables.name: dm
tables.description: Demographics: contains information about the subjects, including identifiers, date of birth, age, sex, ethnicity, and race.

fields.name: SITEID
fields.description: What is the site identifier?

fields.name: SUBJID
fields.description: What is the subject identifier?

fields.name: BRTHDAT
fields.description: What is the subject's date of birth?

fields.name: BRTHYY
fields.description: What is the subject's year of birth?

fields.name: BRTHMO
fields.description: What is the subject's month of birth?

fields.name: BRTHDD
fields.description: What is the subject's day of birth?

fields.name: BRTHTIM
fields.description: What is the subject's time of birth?

fields.name: AGE
fields.description: What is the subject's age?

fields.name: AGEU
fields.description: What is the age unit used?

fields.name: DMDAT
fields.description: What is the date of collection?

fields.name: SEX
fields.description: What is the sex of the subject?

fields.name: ETHNIC
fields.description: What is the ethnicity of the subject?

fields.name: CETHNIC
fields.description: What is the ethnicity of the subject?

fields.name: RACE
fields.description: What is the race of the subject?

fields.name: CRACE
fields.description: What is the race of the subject?

fields.name: RACEOTH
fields.description: What was the other race?

tables.name: ae
tables.description: Adverse Events: contains information about adverse events experienced by subjects during the study.

fields.name: AECAT
fields.description: What is the category of the adverse event?

fields.name: AESCAT
fields.description: What is the subcategory of the adverse event?

fields.name: AEYN
fields.description: Were any adverse events experienced?

fields.name: AESPID
fields.description: What is the adverse event identifier?

fields.name: AETERM
fields.description: What is the adverse event term?

fields.name: AEOCCUR
fields.description: Did the subject have the [pre-specific adverse event/group of adverse events]?

fields.name: AEPRESP
fields.description: Was this [specific adverse event/group of adverse events] pre-specified on the CRF?

fields.name: AESTDAT
fields.description: What is the adverse event start date?

fields.name: AESTTIM
fields.description: What is the adverse event start time?

fields.name: AELOC
fields.description: What is the anatomical location of the adverse event?

fields.name: AELAT
fields.description: What is the side of the anatomical location of the adverse event?

fields.name: AEDIR
fields.description: What is the directionality of the anatomical location of the adverse event?

fields.name: AEPORTOT
fields.description: What was the portion or totality of the anatomical location of the adverse event?

fields.name: AEENDAT
fields.description: What was the adverse event end date?

fields.name: AEENTIM
fields.description: What was the adverse event end time?

fields.name: AEONGO
fields.description: Is the adverse event still ongoing?

fields.name: AESEV
fields.description: What is the severity of the adverse event?

fields.name: AETOX
fields.description: What is the description of the toxicity?

fields.name: AETOXGR
fields.description: What is the toxicity grade of the adverse event?

fields.name: AESER
fields.description: Was the adverse event serious?

fields.name: AESDTH
fields.description: Did the adverse event result in death?

fields.name: AESLIFE
fields.description: Was the adverse event life threatening?

fields.name: AESHOSP
fields.description: Did the adverse event result in initial or prolonged hospitalization for the subject?

fields.name: AESDISAB
fields.description: Did the adverse event result in disability or permanent damage?

fields.name: AESCONG
fields.description: Was the adverse event associated with a congenital anomaly or birth defect?

fields.name: AESINTV
fields.description: Did the adverse event require intervention to prevent permanent impairment or damage due to the use of a medical product?

fields.name: AESMIE
fields.description: Was this adverse event a medically important event not covered by other serious criteria?

fields.name: AESCAN
fields.description: Was the adverse event associated with the development of cancer?

fields.name: AESOD
fields.description: Did the adverse event occur with an overdose?

fields.name: AEREL
fields.description: Was this adverse event related to study treatment?

fields.name: AEACN
fields.description: What action was taken with study treatment?

fields.name: AEACNDYN
fields.description: Were any actions taken with respect to a device in response to this adverse event?

fields.name: AEACNDEV
fields.description: What action was taken with a device used in the study?

fields.name: AEACNOTH
fields.description: What other action(s) was taken?

fields.name: AEOUT
fields.description: What is the outcome of this adverse event?

fields.name: AEDIS
fields.description: Did the adverse event cause the subject to be discontinued from the study?

fields.name: AERLNSYN
fields.description: Was this adverse event due to treatment other than study treatment?

fields.name: AERELNST
fields.description: What is the relationship to non-study treatment?

fields.name: AEPATT
fields.description: What is the adverse event pattern?

fields.name: AECONTRT
fields.description: Was a concomitant or additional treatment given due to this adverse event?

fields.name: AEACNOYN
fields.description: Were any other actions taken in response to this adverse event?

tables.name: ce
tables.description: Clinical events experienced by the subject during the study.

fields.name: CECAT
fields.description: What is the category of the clinical event?

fields.name: CESCAT
fields.description: What is the subcategory of the clinical event?

fields.name: CEYN
fields.description: Were any clinical events experienced?

fields.name: CESPID
fields.description: What is the clinical event identifier?

fields.name: CETERM
fields.description: What is the clinical event term?

fields.name: CEOCCUR
fields.description: Did the subject have the [pre-specified clinical event/group of clinical events ]?

fields.name: CEPRESP
fields.description: Was this [clinical event/group of clinical events] pre-specified on the CRF?

fields.name: CESTDAT
fields.description: What was the [clinical event] start date?

fields.name: CESTTIM
fields.description: What was the [clinical event] start time?

fields.name: CELOC
fields.description: What was the anatomical location of the [clinical event]?

fields.name: CELAT
fields.description: What was the side of the anatomical location of the [clinical event]?

fields.name: CEDIR
fields.description: What was the directionality of the anatomical location of the [clinical event]?

fields.name: CEPORTOT
fields.description: What was the portion or totality of the anatomical location of the of the clinical event?

fields.name: CEENDAT
fields.description: What was the [clinical event] end date?

fields.name: CEENTIM
fields.description: What was the [clinical event] end time?

fields.name: CEONGO
fields.description: Was the [clinical event] still ongoing?

fields.name: CESEV
fields.description: What was the severity of the [clinical event]?

fields.name: CETOX
fields.description: What was the description of the toxicity?

fields.name: CETOXGR
fields.description: What was the toxicity grade?

fields.name: CEMODIFY
fields.description: To what value was the reported term modified?

tables.name: ds
tables.description: Disposition information, including subject status and protocol milestones.

fields.name: DSCAT
fields.description: What was the category of the disposition?

fields.name: DSSCAT
fields.description: What was the subcategory of the disposition?

fields.name: EPOCH
fields.description: What trial period that this disposition refer to?

fields.name: DSDECOD
fields.description: What was the subject's status?

fields.name: DSTERM
fields.description: What was the subject's status?; or What was the Other, Specify?

fields.name: DSSTDAT
fields.description: What was the date of the [protocol milestone/disposition event/other event name]?

fields.name: DSSTTIM
fields.description: What was the time of the [protocol milestone/disposition event/other event name]?

fields.name: DSUNBLND
fields.description: Was treatment unblinded by the site?

fields.name: DSCONT
fields.description: Will the subject continue?

fields.name: DSNEXT
fields.description: What is the next [period /epoch/trial] the subject will [continue to/enter/enroll ]?

fields.name: DSGRPID
fields.description: What is the test group identifier?

tables.name: dv
tables.description: Protocol deviations observed for the subject.

fields.name: DVCAT
fields.description: What is the category of the protocol deviation?

fields.name: DVSCAT
fields.description: What is the subcategory of the protocol deviation?

fields.name: DVYN
fields.description: Were there any protocol deviations?

fields.name: DVDECOD
fields.description: What was the protocol deviation?

fields.name: DVTERM
fields.description: What was the protocol deviation term?

fields.name: DVSTDAT
fields.description: What was the protocol deviation start date?

fields.name: DVSTTIM
fields.description: What was the protocol deviation start time?

fields.name: DVENDAT
fields.description: What was the protocol deviation end date?

fields.name: DVENTIM
fields.description: What was the protocol deviation end time?

fields.name: DVSPID
fields.description: What is the protocol deviation identifier?

tables.name: ho
tables.description: Healthcare encounters and related information.

fields.name: HOSTAT
fields.description: Was the healthcare encounter data collected?

fields.name: HOYN
fields.description: Were there any healthcare encounters?

fields.name: HOCAT
fields.description: What was the category of the healthcare encounter?

fields.name: HOSCAT
fields.description: What was the subcategory of the healthcare encounter?

fields.name: HOOCCUR
fields.description: Did the subject have the [pre-specified healthcare encounter term]?

fields.name: HOREASND
fields.description: What was the reason the data was not collected?

fields.name: HODAT
fields.description: What was the date healthcare encounters data was collected?

fields.name: HOSPID
fields.description: What was the healthcare encounter identifier?

fields.name: HOTERM
fields.description: What was the healthcare encounter? ; Or [Specify Other/Specify Details]

fields.name: HODECOD
fields.description: What was the healthcare encounter?

fields.name: HOSTDAT
fields.description: What was the [healthcare encounter/HOTERM] [start/admission] date?

fields.name: HOSTTIM
fields.description: What was the [healthcare encounter/HOTERM] [start/admission] time?

fields.name: HOENDAT
fields.description: What was the [healthcare encounter/HOTERM] [end/discharge] date?

fields.name: HOENTIM
fields.description: What was the [healthcare encounter/HOTERM] [end/discharge] time?

fields.name: HOCDUR
fields.description: What was the duration of the [healthcare encounter/HOTERM]?

fields.name: HOCDURU
fields.description: What was the duration unit of the [healthcare encounter/HOTERM]?

fields.name: HOONGO
fields.description: Was the [healthcare encounter/HOTERM] ongoing?

fields.name: HOREAS
fields.description: What was the reason for the [healthcare encounter/HOTERM]?

fields.name: HOAENO
fields.description: What was the ID or line number for the adverse event(s), which precipitated the [healthcare encounter/HOTERM]?

tables.name: mh
tables.description: Medical history and prior conditions or events of the subject.

fields.name: MHYN
fields.description: Were any medical conditions or events reported?

fields.name: MHCAT
fields.description: What was the category of the medical history?

fields.name: MHSCAT
fields.description: What was the subcategory of the medical history?

fields.name: MHDAT
fields.description: What was the date the medical history was collected?

fields.name: MHSPID
fields.description: What is the medical condition or event identifier?

fields.name: MHEVTTYP
fields.description: What was the medical history start date type?

fields.name: MHTERM
fields.description: What was the medical condition or event?

fields.name: MHOCCUR
fields.description: Did the subject have the [pre-specified medical condition/event/group of medical conditions]?

fields.name: MHPRESP
fields.description: Was the [medical condition/event/group of medical conditions] pre-specified on the CRF?

fields.name: MHPRIOR
fields.description: Did the medical condition or event start prior to [MHSTPT]? ; Or Did the medical condition or event start prior to study start?

fields.name: MHONGO
fields.description: Is the medical condition or event still ongoing?

fields.name: MHCTRL
fields.description: Is the medical condition or event under control?

fields.name: MHSTDAT
fields.description: What was the medical condition or event start date?

fields.name: MHENDAT
fields.description: What was the medical condition or event end date?

fields.name: MHLOC
fields.description: What was the anatomical location of the medical condition or event?

fields.name: MHLAT
fields.description: What was the side of the anatomical location of the medical condition or event?

fields.name: MHDIR
fields.description: What was the directionality of the anatomical location of the medical condition or event?

fields.name: MHPORTOT
fields.description: What was the portion or totality of the anatomical location of the of the medical condition or event?

fields.name: MHMODIFY
fields.description: To what value was the reported term modified?

tables.name: da
tables.description: Drug accountability and treatment return information.

fields.name: RETAMT_DAPERF
fields.description: Was the return treatment drug accountability performed?

fields.name: RETAMT_DACAT
fields.description: What was the type of treatment returned?

fields.name: RETAMT_DASCAT
fields.description: What was the name of the treatment returned?

fields.name: RETAMT_DAREFID
fields.description: What was the returned treatment label identifier?

fields.name: RETAMT_DADAT
fields.description: What was the date the treatment was returned?

fields.name: RETAMT_DAORRES
fields.description: What is the amount returned?

fields.name: RETAMT_DAORRESU
fields.description: What was the unit?

fields.name: DAGRPID
fields.description: What is the test group identifier?

fields.name: DATESTCD_DAPERF
fields.description: Was drug accountability performed?

fields.name: DATESTCD_DACAT
fields.description: What was the type of treatment for which drug accountability was assessed?

fields.name: DATESTCD_DASCAT
fields.description: What was the name of the treatment for which drug accountability was assessed?

fields.name: DATESTCD_DAREFID
fields.description: What was the treatment label identifier?

fields.name: DATESTCD_DADAT
fields.description: What was the date drug accountability was assessed?

fields.name: DATESTCD_DAORRES
fields.description: What is the amount of the drug accountability assessment?

fields.name: DATESTCD_DAORRESU
fields.description: What was the unit of the [DATEST] result?

fields.name: DAPERF
fields.description: Was drug accountability performed?

fields.name: DACAT
fields.description: What was the type of treatment for which drug accountability was assessed?

fields.name: DASCAT
fields.description: What was the name of the treatment for which drug accountability was assessed?

fields.name: DADAT
fields.description: What was the date of drug accountability?

fields.name: DAREFID
fields.description: What was the treatment label identifier?

fields.name: DATEST
fields.description: What was the drug accountability being assessed?

fields.name: DAORRES
fields.description: What is the drug accountability assessment amount?

fields.name: DAORRESU
fields.description: What was the unit?

tables.name: dd
tables.description: Details about death events and related assessments.

fields.name: DDCAT
fields.description: What is the category of the death detail?

fields.name: DDSCAT
fields.description: What is the subcategory of the death detail?

fields.name: DDYN
fields.description: Were any death details collected?

fields.name: DDDAT
fields.description: What was the date death detail assessments were collected?

fields.name: DDSPID
fields.description: What was the death detail identifier?

fields.name: DDTEST
fields.description: What was the death detail test name?

fields.name: DDORRES
fields.description: What was the death detail result?

fields.name: DDEVAL
fields.description: Who provided the death detail information?

tables.name: eg
tables.description: Electrocardiogram (ECG) findings and related assessments.

fields.name: EGCAT
fields.description: What was the category of the ECG finding?

fields.name: EGSCAT
fields.description: What was the subcategory of the ECG finding?

fields.name: EGPERF
fields.description: Was the ECG performed?

fields.name: EGREFID
fields.description: What was the ECG reference identifier?

fields.name: EGMETHOD
fields.description: What was the method used for the ECG?

fields.name: EGPOS
fields.description: What was the position of the subject during the ECG measurement?

fields.name: EGTPT
fields.description: What was the planned time point of the ECG measurement?

fields.name: EGTIM
fields.description: What was the time the ECG was collected?

fields.name: EGTEST
fields.description: What was the ECG test name?

fields.name: EGORRES
fields.description: What was the result of the ECG?

fields.name: EGORRESU
fields.description: What was the unit of the ECG results?

fields.name: EGCLSIG
fields.description: Was the ECG clinically significant?

fields.name: EGDAT
fields.description: What was the ECG date?

fields.name: INTP_EGORRES
fields.description: What was the interpretation of the ECG?

fields.name: EGMHNO
fields.description: What was the ID or line number for the medical history event that was reported as a clinically significant ECG finding?

fields.name: EGAENO
fields.description: What was the ID or line number for the adverse event that was reported as a clinically significant ECG finding?

tables.name: ie
tables.description: Eligibility criteria assessment for the subject.

fields.name: IEYN
fields.description: Were all eligibility criteria met?

fields.name: IEDAT
fields.description: What was the date the eligibility criteria assessment was performed?

fields.name: IECAT
fields.description: What was the category of the criterion?

fields.name: IESCAT
fields.description: What was the subcategory of the criterion?

fields.name: IETESTCD
fields.description: What was the identifier of the inclusion criterion the subject did not meet or the exclusion criterion the subject meet ?

fields.name: IETEST
fields.description: What was the description of the criterion the subject did not meet?

fields.name: IEORRES
fields.description: What is the result?

tables.name: lb
tables.description: Laboratory test results and related information.

fields.name: LBDAT
fields.description: What was the date of the lab specimen collection?

fields.name: LBTIM
fields.description: What was the [start] time of the lab specimen collection?

fields.name: LBCAT
fields.description: What was the name of the lab panel?

fields.name: LBSCAT
fields.description: What was name of the lab sub-panel?

fields.name: LBTPT
fields.description: What was the planned time point of the lab?

fields.name: LBCOND
fields.description: Were the protocol-defined testing conditions met?

fields.name: LBFAST
fields.description: Was the subject fasting?

fields.name: LBREFID
fields.description: What was the accession number?

fields.name: LBTEST
fields.description: What was the lab test name?

fields.name: LBPERF
fields.description: Was the sample collected?; or Was the lab performed?

fields.name: LBSPCCND
fields.description: What was the condition of the specimen?

fields.name: LBORRES
fields.description: What was the result of the lab test?

fields.name: LBMETHOD
fields.description: What was the method used for the lab test or examination?

fields.name: LBORRESU
fields.description: What was the unit of the lab result?

fields.name: LBTOXGR
fields.description: What is the Toxicity Grade?

fields.name: LBTOX
fields.description: What is the description of the toxicity?

fields.name: LBORNRLO
fields.description: What was the lower limit of the reference range for this lab test?

fields.name: LBORNRHI
fields.description: What was the high limit of the reference range for this lab test?

fields.name: LBNRIND
fields.description: How [did/does] the reported values compare within the reference range?

fields.name: LBCLSIG
fields.description: Was this lab result clinically significant?

fields.name: LBNAM
fields.description: What was the name of the laboratory used?

tables.name: mi
tables.description: Microscopic examination (MI) sample measurements and metadata for the subject.

fields.name: MIPERF
fields.description: Was the microscopic examination performed?

fields.name: MIREFID
fields.description: What was the accession number?

fields.name: MITIM
fields.description: What was the [start] time of the specimen collection?

fields.name: MISPEC
fields.description: What is the specimen material type?

fields.name: MISPCCND
fields.description: What was the condition of the specimen?

fields.name: MILOC

fields.name: MILAT
fields.description: What was the side of the anatomical location of the specimen collection?

fields.name: MIDIR
fields.description: What was the directionality of the anatomical location of the specimen collection?

fields.name: MICLSIG
fields.description: Was the result clinically significant?

fields.name: MISPID
fields.description: What is the microscopic test identifier?

fields.name: MIDAT
fields.description: What was the date of the specimen collection?

fields.name: MICAT
fields.description: What was the category of the microscopic finding?

fields.name: MISCAT
fields.description: What was the subcategory of the microscopic finding?

fields.name: MITEST
fields.description: What was the microscopic examination test name?

fields.name: MITSTDTL
fields.description: What was the microscopic examination detail?

fields.name: MIORRES
fields.description: What was the result of the examination?

fields.name: MIORRESU
fields.description: What was the unit of the result?

fields.name: MIRESCAT
fields.description: What was the result category?

fields.name: MINAM
fields.description: What was the name of the vendor used?

fields.name: MIMETHOD
fields.description: What was the method used for the test or examination?

fields.name: MIEVAL
fields.description: Who was the evaluator?

tables.name: pc
tables.description: Pharmacokinetics (PK) sample measurements for the subject.

fields.name: PCPERF
fields.description: Were PK samples collected?

fields.name: PCCSTAT
fields.description: Was the PK sample collected?

fields.name: PCREASND
fields.description: What was the reason the PK sample was not collected?

fields.name: PCDAT
fields.description: What was the date of the PK sample collection?

fields.name: PCDATFL
fields.description: Was this specimen/sample collected on the same date as the (last/previous specimen/sample) (collected/collection ended)?

fields.name: PCTIM
fields.description: What was the [start] time of the PK sample collection?

fields.name: PCENDAT
fields.description: What was the end date of the specimen collection?

fields.name: PCENDATF
fields.description: Was this specimen/sample collection ended on the same day as the current specimen’s start date?

fields.name: PCENTIM
fields.description: What was the specimen collection end time?

fields.name: PCTPT
fields.description: What was the planned time point of the PK sample collection?

fields.name: PCFAST
fields.description: Was the subject fasting?

fields.name: PCCOND
fields.description: Were the protocol-defined testing conditions met?

fields.name: PCREFID
fields.description: What was the accession number?

fields.name: PCSPEC
fields.description: What was the specimen material type?

fields.name: PECAT

fields.name: PECLSIG

fields.name: PEREASND

fields.name: PELOC

fields.name: PEMETHOD
fields.description: What was the method used for the test or examination?

tables.name: sc

fields.name: SCTEST
fields.description: What is the subject characteristic name?

fields.name: SCORRES
fields.description: What is the subject's characteristic?

fields.name: SCGRPID
fields.description: What is the test group identifier?

fields.name: MARISTAT_SCORRES
fields.description: What is the subject's marital status?

fields.name: NATORIG_SCORRES
fields.description: What is the subject's national origin?

fields.name: EDLEVEL_SCORRES

fields.name: SKINTYP_SCORRES

tables.name: sr
tables.description: Skin response assessments, including reactions or lesions.

fields.name: SRPERF
fields.description: Was a skin response test performed?

fields.name: SRREASND
fields.description: What was the reason the test was not done?

fields.name: SRCAT
fields.description: What was the category of the skin response?

fields.name: SRSCAT
fields.description: What was the subcategory of the skin response?

fields.name: SRSPID
fields.description: What is the skin response identifier?

fields.name: SROBJ
fields.description: What intervention was performed to elicit the skin response?

fields.name: SRRFTDAT
fields.description: What was the date the [intervention] was administered?

fields.name: SRRFTTIM
fields.description: What was the time the [intervention] was administered?

fields.name: SRLOC
fields.description: What was the anatomical location of the skin response measurement?

fields.name: SRLAT
fields.description: What was the side of the anatomical location of the skin response measurement?

fields.name: SRTEST
fields.description: What was the skin response test name?

fields.name: SRTPT
fields.description: What was the planned time point for skin response measurement?

fields.name: SRDAT
fields.description: What was the date of the measurement?

fields.name: SRTIM
fields.description: What was the time of the measurement?

fields.name: SRDIR
fields.description: What was the directionality of the anatomical location of the skin response test?

fields.name: SREVAL
fields.description: Who was the evaluator?

fields.name: SREVALID
fields.description: What was the identifier of the evaluator providing the skin response information?

fields.name: SRORRES
fields.description: What was the result of the measurement?

fields.name: SRORRESU
fields.description: What was the unit of the measurement?

fields.name: SRNRIND
